title: Taliyah Auto animation shooting sideways
body: ^ Freljord Taliyah auto animation shoots at an angle and kinda throws me off.

replies.body: This occurs on both the champion and the skin. ;-; We've got a fix in, ready for next patch!

Freljord Taliyah auto-attack animation seems wonky. When standing sideways and AAing, the animation seems to be thrown at a slant. It also seems like a blurry object, rather than a chunk of ice. 

I rarely use base skin so I'm not sure if it has the same issue
